content.detailedDescription:
It was april end but i can remember the exact date. even it has been more than 6 years i am submitting this information to you. because at that time i didnt knew of such internet facilities and doesnt knew that ufo are available online. so let me start my story... i and my 2 friends were sitting outside in front of our room in dharwad ( a city in karanataka in india). i was studying my secondary in this city and i was staying with my roomates i a room. we were sitting outside our room on the road. there was a heap of sand on the road which was put for some construction work.
i and my two friends were chatting about some matters. suddenly our room owners son came out of his house for pissing. he was pissing on the road and we were teasing him. after that we turned our attention and were busying chating. suddenly that little boy pointed to the sky and said " see ........ a big aeroplane....!" he shouted. at once we three looked at the sky and saw a strange object. it was not a neither a plane nor a chopper. but was in triangular shape with 3 lights on each end... it was so close that i would have caught it if i was on a 2-storei building.
it was cruising towards a hill on which our college was located.. we chased it upto 4-5 minutes.... but we couldnt climb the mountain so fast. and it was approx 30-40km/hr moving faster... at last we climbed the mountain after 20 minutes suspecting that it would have landed on the mountain......But it was not there..

it dissappeared in the clouds.....

that was mind blowing. we were sure it was a ufo(non-human made).
the whole night we didnt slept.....
morning we shared these experiences with our friends... no one beleieved. but we 3 were confident. next day a daily news paper reported a ufo sighting. and after that every one beleived.
content.summary: It was a trianglur ufo. with 3 lights on each corner...With no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My father and step-mother had just picked me up from my mother's house on dauphin island parkway. i lived with them during the school year to attend a better highschool in their area. we often drove along mobile bay on bayfront road to calm my younger half-brothers and get them to go to sleep. we were driving along very slowly looking out into the water between the trees when we came upon the first big opening. there we saw a white craft hovering above the water, barely twenty yards off the coast.

the first thing that came to mind was, "oh my god! is this real?" my brothers were screaming with exctiement, hell we all were. i remember a lot of, "do you see that?" and "what is it?". my father and step-mother were wearing the same jaw dropped expression as we were.

my step-mother, who was driving the van, pulled over and we observed the craft for about forty-five minutes. it made no movements at all, it just hovered over the water. there was a light shining down into the water from below the craft as well as several other lights mounted along the surface. it stood straight up and down and resembled what i would call a "tylenol" capsule. we could see some form of writing along one side of the craft, illuminated by one of the lights on the craft. the writing was red in color and appeared to be some kind of symbols.

at one point i popped open the side door and tried to get out. i wanted to get a closer look but was rather harshly told to get back in the van by my father. we argued back and forth for a few minutes but he wouldn't budge on his position so i closed the door.

i'd estimate that the craft was thrity feet from top to bottom and roughly half that wide. there was what seemed to be a window near the center of the craft with bright white light coming from it. there was also what i thought looked like a small runged ladder on one side. i'd say it was maybe five feet in length striaght up and down and to the right of what appeared to be the window.

i recall a faint sound coming from the craft but nothing booming that i would associate with a helicopter or airplane, more like a dull humming. the water below the craft did ripple though. after about forty-five minutes my father and step-mother decided we had seen enough and cranked up the van and pulled off from the shoulder of the road. my two brothers and i looked back to see if the craft was still there and it wasn't. we then looked into the sky and saw a bright white light, probably a mile or more high.

as we headed down dauphin island parkway the object seemed to be following us. we made a quick stop at a grocery store and my father, i and my two brothers remained in the van and watched the object hovering high above in the sky. my step-mother returned and we headed for their home in the emogene street and sage avenue area. we could still see the object in the sky and as we turned onto their street the object seemed to descend to about thirty feet above the treetops. when we pulled into their driveway, we watched the object disappear over the trees as it headed towards the park directly behind thier house.

as we exited the van we headed into the house and my father, brothers and i immediately went into the back yard to see if we could view the craft. it was nowhere to be seen. that was the last we saw of it. in the months after, there were a number of strange things that happened in that house. things that frightened me and give me chills to this day. i went to live with my mother shortly afterwards and my father and his family eventually moved from the house.

this all happened from about 8:45 p.M. until we arrived at their home at about 10:30 p.M.
content.summary: Ufo encounter started along mobile bay on bayfront road near nan seas.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking gsd, playing ball, looked up and saw fast streak of light moving west to east. at first i thought it was a metorite buring up, but object now apeared to be two.  looked like dogfight from days in military.  objects  changed coarse but stayed on the same vector. objects now out of site.
i felt that i saw part of a dog fight in space! i still can not belive it!
content.summary: Streak of light moving across moon, moving west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
Today, sunday (5-27-07), at about 4:40p.M., i was working as a concierge in a high rise condo on the beach (in boca raton)when i noticed a white object over the atlantic ocean. the event is very similar to the event i reported on 4-29-07, the only difference being the object was out near the horizon and i was able to get three pictures using my kodak z740 digital camera.
again, as same as the last time, the object remained stationary for a good hour above the ocean before heavy cloud cover made it impossible to observe.
when i magnified the image up to 8x using the cameras built in system, the object appeared to be diamond shaped.
as soon as i can transfer the images to my computer, i will upload the pictures.
content.summary: Similar to the sighting i reported on 4-29-07.

content.detailedDescription: This story is completely true and nothing is made up. i was out in pennsylvania, where i used to live. i had just gotten kicked out of a junior high basketball game because i was yelling at the stupid fat kid. i don't even know how he made the team. anyway i was walking home because my license was revoked for throwing cherry bombs out my widow at pedestrians. so i was walking home and i saw flashing towards me. at first i thought it was the cops so i threw my beer in the bushes. when it got closer i realized it wasn't the police so i dove back into the bushes for my beer. when i came back out i saw a big shiny disc with glowing lights all over it flying in the air. then i passed out. i just thought i should tell someone because this was pretty awesome.
content.summary: I can't believe i'm telling people about this.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was sitting in my room and all those rascals went to lunch in the lunch room. i was happy to get my break but it felt like there was a presance in the room. something weird was in the air and i could sence it. im a teacher so i decided to go grade papers on the computer. all of the sudden a flash of light and a bunch of smoke came out of my t.V. i decided to run out of the room and right before i did i saw that it was looking at the childrens names on the computer so i had to save there identity from "them". they could have been aprehended in lunch but i saved there life. i just want to have a crew come down to medford and check out my room i havent touched it yet and they thrashed it and lefted this gew everywhere. some of the kids saw it to and were instantly killed. i called the police and they didnt listen to me. please help mufon!
content.summary: It came out of my t.V. and was amazing

content.detailedDescription:
It was the begining of the summer of 64 late in the evening. i was sitting on my front porch as i have done many times and just enjoying the warm evening and watching the stars. i lived in sheepshead bay so it was common to observe the incoming flights to jfk airport which i also would would follow as they made their approch pattern before landing. on this particular night this one light in the far distance was not following the normal approch course which caused me to follow it more intently. it was moving from south to north turning than north to south. thought it was stange but it appeared to have airline flashing lights so i kept watching waiting for it to form a normal landing pattern. as it got closer i than observed the flashing lights started to take the shape of what then looked like a blimp with scrolling letters but there was no letters? so i keep staring at it waiting to see what message it might be displaying. all along beliving at that point it was a blimp as it had no sounds and was common to see over manhattan & brighten beach but never in the evenings. i continued it slow back and forth flight pattern disappeared breifly (vision blocked by the homes)until it finally came several yards from my house just above what seemed like several 100 yards up and a span of several houses. at that point i could see the object clearly. still in disbelief of what i was looking at i walked down my steps and stared at it for i don't know how long with a 100 thoughts running thru my mind of what it could be until the realization that it wasn't a blimp, a film prop, etc. etc. and a cold chill of fear ran thru me. i ran back to my house and locked myself in and turned of the lights (lol i was a kid, who thinks)after awhile i got up enough nerve to go to the window and peek out, it was gone. i check both the front and back but could not see it. my parents were out that evening and i sat in the dark waiting for them to return and when they did i hystericaly blurting out what i saw. needless to say they ignored it. 

from the distance it appeared to look cylindrical with flashing strobbing lights but once it was close enough to see it was circular with the lights (retangular pane's) along the rim, there was no sound except for possibly the sounds of wind moving as it hovered motionless above me. the underside was flat but had an irrgular pattern. ok, here's the kicker, a few nights later i was at a party when i overhear a young man talking about ufo's so of course i began to listen to what he was say and interupted his conversation with i just saw one. he immediately responded with so did he and described exactly as i have. turned out he also lived several blocks from me although i had never meet him before but he was sitting on his back porch when he also noticed the irregular movements and started to watch it as well. those memories have lingered in my mind and every time i by chance turn on a show relating to ufo's i keep hoping someone has documented it or has an explanation for what we had observed that night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Watch for over an hour at a distance as it snaked back and forth moving slowly and closer

content.detailedDescription: Megatron looks freaking awesome all of you nuts need to go see that movie now. i don't care if it isn't out yet go see it. i have already collected all the action figures.
content.summary: I saw the preview for the transformers movie

content.detailedDescription:
Although i would like to divulge detailed information to you, i must first think of my family. as an officer on the fdr i too witnessed a daytime event involving a cigar shaped craft that covered a span of at least 100 feet.  a larger 300+ foot cigar and two 50 foot (roughly) round discs.

without stating my position, i will state that we attempted to engage the craft with weaponry and in the 10 minutes of viewing and the 4 minutes of this attempt, the weapons would not allow themselves to be prepared for engagement.  we also attempted to prepare launch of aircraft at the conclusion of the event.

i was informed of the object when it arrived by fellow officer who engaged me in conversation concerning the proper procedure in dealing with this type of event.

at the 14 minute mark the craft rapidly travelled upward as two small round objects exited the water.  at the 21 minute mark, a much larger cigar arrived from directly above the fdr and the two smaller disks enetered the cigar and then the cigar once again departed upward at 23 minutes roughly. at 26 minute mark the cigar returned and dove into the water.
content.summary: Fdr executive officer

content.detailedDescription: Hello, mate. i'm from downunder. listen to this story mufon.Com. i was out boxing a kangaroo when i saw some lights approaching. i looked up then down again and saw that was in the air. i punched one of the lights in the face then it let me go. my trusty kangaroo caught me and i bounced away with him. it was crazy mate. i think the lights were actually just my parents with flashlights and th trampoline would account for bouncing, but i don't care.
content.summary: It was freaking crazy! lights everywhere.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck in back of my house. i was with my neighbor and my daughter. i looked up and said hey what is that. my neighbor said it was a sattelite, i said no way it's too low to be a sattelite. so for second there i thought he may be right. i kept following this object with my eyes. just as it was all most out of view. a white flash of light came from the object about ten times the size of the object itself and then it was gone or out or view. this object looked liked it was about 30,000 ft. up right about where commercial airlines fly, which go over my house frequently and i know their flight path. this object was traveling quite fast and opposite of airline flight paths. i've seen sattelites before and they are usually hard to spot and the moon was bright that night so it would be even harder to spot. this object was pretty easy to see. my daughter also saw the flash of light, my neighbor did not because he was trying to explain that it was a sattelite and he wasn't looking.
content.summary: On back deck of my house, i was looking up   in the sky and i saw a white light going by, like a sattelite, but it was too low.

content.detailedDescription: at seven pm i set off to hunt some doves it was a clear day no clouds dusk was approaching, i was hunting on an indian reservation a friend lives on in northfork california, the direct center of california as i looked up to shoot some doves flying overhead i noticed a very bright object at approxomitly five thousand feet in the air i was at approxomitly twentyfive hundred feet elavation so the craft was three thousand feet from me approxomitly i looked at it for about five seconds and said to a  friend it seems rather early for stars to be out she looked up and said that is no star, as i looked at again i saw that it was very shiny in appearance saucer type approxomitly one to two hundred feet in diamater as we looked at for a total of fifteen seconds it shot strait up in the air at an unbielivable speed, it was out of sight in less that two seconds, she could not belive her eys but i have seen them before while serving in the navy, and we had talked before about ufos, she was highly skepticle, but not any more, i have been intrested about ufos since childhood i am very noligable on the subject and am not prone to jumping to conclusions, the thing that i noticed the most was the brilliance of the object mirror like or polished stainless steel.
content.summary: Was setting off to go hunting as i looked up i saw a shiny disc object.

content.detailedDescription: I was in korea. me and my platoon had found a box of marijuana. we thought we'd give it a shot. we weren't high, we only had 8 puffs each. me and my platoon were looking up at the stars when we saw them flash by. it was like being fired upon by a machine gun, but they were colored alot of colors. one of the ufos lodged into my partners chest. he said that "they" wanted peace, but i don't think he meant it because he shot me in the leg. i shot him the head because he was growing tentacles i think. the rest of the platoon had run off. moments later strange, smll men with squinty eyes dragged me away. i woke up later in a cage, it was surrounded by the little men. they were speaking in a wierd language. i don't remember anything else from that awful night. the next thing i remmember was i woke up with a horrible headache in the middle of my living room. they have been watching me ever since. as i right this i know i don't have much time left on this world, but i know that mufon needs to hear my story.
content.summary: There were 100 of them and they made a gun like sound

content.detailedDescription: I was on my patio having a cigarette.It was just getting dark,the stars were visible.I noticed what i thought was a shooting star,but it did not move.It was bright white but was not glowing.It seemed to change shape a little.I thought it could be a plane but there were no blinking lights.It was very clear to me for about 30 seconds.I was in awe of it.Then it just fizzled out.Could someone please tell me what i saw?
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Disc,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere
content.summary: Really bright white image but very clear..Not fuzzy

content.detailedDescription: My grandson and i were fishing apx 16 miles offshore south of dauphin island. we were watching the stars, it was a very clear night. there were 3 stars that were overhead that we watched come across the sky for about an hour. standard ark across the sky. well then one of them started to move very rapidly in many different directions,90 degree turns and that sort of thing. and then it was joined by two others that came from space. it was like they were doing a dance in the sky for us,going in every direction at very fast speeds and stopping. looking like stars again.This took place for over an hour,we had stoped fishing and just watched. then all three headed up and out into space. my grandson was very surprised as he had never seen them before i was not so surprised as i have seen them before on four other nights,i have fished offshore for many years. i also have documentation of inplants in my brain, and memorys of being abducted sence the age of five.This also happend to my father,he could never come to terms with this, and had a very hard time with it. this is the first time that i have told anyone other than those close to me. my wife has had a hard time with this for 30 years,it has made me diffrent from others.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: At first it looked like any other star just brighter,then when it moved and the others came they were much brighter and changed colors to yellow,ornge and brite white.

content.detailedDescription: Both the events of april 24, 2007 and may 21 or 22 , correspond with refueling training exercises conducted from grissom air force base- central indiana- kc 135 super tankers refueling the triangular shaped b-2.  perhaps the hose extentions light up too. oh well......Now beam me up scotty !!!
content.summary: Unusual light formations in sky.....

content.detailedDescription: I was in a town cambell town next to the one i lived in.  i was at a friends house.  so i started driving home.  there's a stretch of 6 miles between my town and the town i was in.  its all open fields except for two house before you hit the fields.  there was a full moon out, and i know there was one house left before there were no more houses.  i noticed a bright light shining on top of a tree.  i thought there's no telephone pole there.  i slowed down to a stop, i could see the shape very well.  there was no one on the road. the light turned 90 degrees.  so i sat there and watched the light.  it was about 60 yards away.  it turned and started going across the road i was on, at tree top level.  it had a blue and red light, one on each side, with a large white spot light shining on the ground as it went across a field.  it went very slow and just kept cruising at tree top level going across the field.  it wasn't a helicoptor or plane.  it was sitting still above a tree.  the next day i went to work and a co-worker said he saw the ship going across the field.
content.summary: Very large, silent

content.detailedDescription: This happened 5-23-07 at 10:15 pm. my boys and i had just finished watching american idol which ended at 10 pm est. after the show i went to check the doors to make sure they were locked and we were all going to bed. when i got to sliding door in back of the house i noticed that the planet venus was visible again so i went outside to look at in my back yard. i looked at it and the moon which was to upper left of the planet(i presume it was venus). it was a clear sky and i thought it would be neat for the boys to see this so i went back into the house and called the boys down to take a look at a planet. so we all went back outside and looked at it. as we were looking at it my oldest boy said what is that? and ofcourse i said what and he pointed to the north our right. when i looked i saw two points of light that were spaced apart and the second was flickering eratically and real fast which i thought was odd. they were both moving fast headed south towards indianapolis. the flickering pattern was inconsistent unlike a normal jetliner. the second light vanished and i said where did it go but the first light was still moving( i can't remmeber if the lead light was flickering). then the second light reappeared and again behind it but somewhat above and behaving eratically and again the flickering which i can only describe as like "machine gun fast" and it seemed like it was moving in zig zag but still behind the first light. i made the comment to my son it seemed like it was chasing it. we watched this for about 10 seconds as they both flew south and the trees and our house blocked our view so we ran around to the front and they were gone. we kept looking for 20 more minutes but nothing. ofcourse we were saying it must be a plane or something but as we kept looking we saw a normal plane with normal lights and very consistent which was clearly different then what we saw. one last thing there was no noise,only white points of light no other colors and these things were clearly flying and moving fast.

I got something i think you might be interested in. again while viewing the hazecam.Net site a short time ago (it is now 5:26 pm eastern time) i was viewing the newark/new york cam when i saw 2 unknowns. one may be a blimp (the lower one) i'm not sure. the one near the plane in my opinion cannot possibly be a plane because they are too near each other.
 
judging by the closeness of the 2 craft, and the fact that it is a jumbo jet being directed by a control tower from either jfk international or newark international that would be considered a near miss.
 
in any event i am at a loss as to what it or in fact they may be. it seems i have been seeing a lot of unknowns on the hazecam.Net site (i have several that are in my files right now)
content.summary: 2 objects on hazecam webcam photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking outside my rural house around 10:30 pm and glanced at the northern sky.  in the northwest, a dim steady light point was moving in an easterly direction.  i assumed it was a satellite and followed the light in hopes it was an iridium flare, a satellite that brightens quickly when it reflects sunlight.  i have seen dozens of these iridium flares over the past few years.  after traveling for a few seconds, the light gradually turned north and headed for the horizon.  this struck me as very strange, because the curve was too steep for typical plane and the fact that the light had no resemblance to a plane.  the light soon died out, much like satellites commonly do.  i then heard a jet sound emanating from the direction of the light, but saw no jet.  this could be a coincidence.
	
	next i saw a bright reddish flash closer to the horizon, but where the light���s trajectory should have placed it.  this flash was like a sudden brightening, similar to a meteor, but slower and more controlled.  i then saw two simultaneous flashes and for the next few minutes i saw two flickering lights travel in many directions, usually fading away and then reappearing in a new location, always in the northern sky.  the flickers were at first somewhat rhythmic with a double flicker followed by a single, but soon became more irregular.  every so often the lights would simultaneously flash reddish.

	the lights next appeared in the north-northeast and traveled westward, one slightly ahead of the other, flashing irregularly the entire time.  the front light faded, but as the second light continued westward, the other appeared at the original starting location.  this time it traveled eastward, and both were traveling on the same horizontal line.  finally, after a short time (appx. 1 min) of nothing, i saw the reddish double flash occur.  this time the flashes were very close together (less than a degree probably) and hooked from left to down to right in a tight arc.  after the flash was over, i never saw the lights reappear.

	i���ve been an amateur astronomer for years and have never seen anything like this.  i am college education with a background in science and engineering, and i try to logically analyze things.  several reports of near identical situations have been reported out of semi-nearby lafayette in the past few days.  perhaps this is something military related, but all i know is that i have no current explanation of what could possibly make this light display with the movements i observed.
content.summary: Light and flash display, similar to many recent nearby reports

content.detailedDescription:
A strong white light moved in the sky, leaveing a trace of light that disappeared quickly after the object. it looked like a trace made by little shiny stars vanishing.
the object appeard from out of nothing, and disappeared from out of nothing, in the sky not very far from me. it flew in horizontal direction. it couldn't have been a plane, a balloon or fireworks. the speed, light intensity and traject are not compatible with any object here, specially because it appeared and disappreared in the clear sky. it couldn't have been a falling star as well, it was too close to here, and it wasn't falling, it was flying. 
i saw other spaceships before, i can descrbe them in details if you want. they were very close to me. the first was hovering less than 50 meters away. i was looking at it from the 8th floor apt window with my brother. we were kids but we know what we saw. not a long time after that, i saw another object flying over my buildng. i was alone and i still ask myself if i really saw it.
i'd like to know about dreams...
content.summary: Strong white light.

content.detailedDescription:
We are located in lafayette indiana in a subdivision near the intersection of hwy 65 and hwy 26.  last night at approximately 10pm my husband and i decided to walk our two small dogs. we were walking in the direction of hwy 26 east when i spotted two large circles/flashes of light in the sky very near each other--they were light orange in color.  by the time i could get out "omg are those planes on fire?!?" they had disappeared.  then two small specs of white light (almost like distant stars) were seen flashing quickley in the sky in different directions.

my husband joked that "maybe it's a ufo".  as we rounded the corner i spotted an adult male and three children standing on their driveway staring up.  my husband said "i bet they saw what you saw".  i went up to the man and asked him "did you see that?".  he said "yes the ufo's? they have been doing this pattern for about two weeks".  he then went on to explain that he has witnessed this same kind of event for the past two weeks from his backyard at night.  he stated that generally the two small specs of light come together turn orange and then race away. he said that generally it happens around every 15 minutes or so. as we spoke with him we could see the specs of light (5-6 of them) racing around the sky at what i would imagine to be very high speeds.  there were planes also in the sky but they were very self evident as to what they were.

we did not stay very long and went back to the house.  my husband went outside with binoculars to see anything but did not witness the orange light happenings.

the entire event was quite creepy and i really do not have explanation for it.  i do not really believe one way or the other in alien life or ufo's but it was very evident that what i witnessed last night was surely not run of the mill plane activity.
content.summary: Two large balls of light orange spotted close together then dissappearing and reappearing as small dots flashing (like stars) traveling very fast around the sky (multiple of the small flash--5-6)

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, when a co-worker called me out to see these blinking lights over the southern sky, they we amber colored but they didn't seem to be typical of a jet. after staring at them for a couple of minutes they went away, a building obstucted our view.  we were talking it over when they appeared again and this time they were "headed" west we heard a loud roar,kind of like a jet but after about 2-3 minutes they dissappeared again, they kind of vanished this time nothin was blocing our view.
content.summary: Several amber colored lights in the southern  sky over lorain, ohio

content.detailedDescription: Now i'm just a simple person, with little education, and only humble beginnings, but i know a genuine phenonemon when i sees one. now on occasions i can be an arrogant person, and many of my friends have deserted me because of this, which meant i was all by my self when i saw this object. it was only a brief glimpse, yet i knew i'd seen something spectacular. it was flying low over the ground, and seemed to have 3 strange lights blinking on it. this was the triangle i saw. i also heard this great roar, but it was like you know unworldly, as in not from around here. it scared me. i hesitate to tell you this, as i told no one of this before, and it terrified me.
content.summary: Strange triangle of lights appeared over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gotten off work at 5:40pm and was heading home along a dirt path. it was the usual shortcut that i took home after work so that it didn't take me a half hour to get home. 
i looked up the sky and noticed that the sun was beginning to set and that soon it would be dark, so i picked up my walking speed so that i wouldn't be left walking at night. just as i was reaching the end to the dirt road i looked up at the sky again and noticed what appeared to be a dark metallic object on fire in the sky. i thought that it was a meteor, but as i focused harder i noticed that it began swaying from side to side, as if it had lost control. i looked at my watch and saw that the time was precisly 5:46pm. as i watched the cigar shaped object swaying from side to side i felt like i was witnessing something truly astounding that made my heart race.
after ten minutes the fire that had engulfed the object ceased, and the dark metallic object stopped swaying and straightened up. i couldn't believe what i was seeing. then, before i could do anything the object hovered into the sky for a few metres and then disappeared completely. 
after that i quickly ran home to tell my family of the event that had occured, but they said that i was crazy and should rest. i was upset that they didn't believe me, and was saddened deeply after the object had disappeared. that night my dreams were full of the object in the sky, and the next day i went around my neighbourhood, asking if others had seen the same thing. a married couple living across the street from me said that they noticed an unusually bright object in the sky but took no real notice to it. i knew that i had to report my sighting.

yours faithfully,
                 matt.
content.summary: What seemed to be a ufo on fire.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting with a friend on my patio.  we have no streetlights in out area, so the stars are very visable.  i caught something to my right out of my perifial vision - something like red lights.  i thought maybe some kids were shining a red flashlight or something. i turned to look, then stood up and stepped out farther onto the patio to get a good look.  it was two bright red lights (dots) traveling together across the sky.  my first thought was it was a plane, as we have a lot of jets flying over, so i'm use to seeing those.  this looked a lot closer.  i told my friend to come see, and by the time she got there, they had disappeared.  they were quite bright, and then just totally disappered.

i was stunned, to say the least. i just said "what was that?"  i don't know if maybe it was some sort of low meteor, but i've seen quite a few and none of them looked like that.  i just was bewildered.
content.summary: Two red lights moving together, one behind the other, then suddenly disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting with a friend on my patio.  we have no streetlights in out area, so the stars are very visable.  i caught something to my right out of my perifial vision - something like red lights.  i thought maybe some kids were shining a red flashlight or something. i turned to look, then stood up and stepped out farther onto the patio to get a good look.  it was two bright red lights (dots) traveling together across the sky.  my first thought was it was a plane, as we have a lot of jets flying over, so i'm use to seeing those. also, no sound - i would have heard jets at that level. this looked a lot closer.  i told my friend to come see, and by the time she got there, they had disappeared.  they were quite bright, and then just totally disappered.

i was stunned, to say the least. i just said "what was that?"  i don't know if maybe it was some sort of low meteor, but i've seen quite a few and none of them looked like that.  i just was bewildered.
content.summary: Two red lights moving together, one behind the other, then suddenly disappearing

content.detailedDescription: This is an attachment to a recent sighting i reported on 5/19/07.  i was lying in bed where the ne sky is viewed from my large window.  i saw a bright light come from the left margin of my window and speed accross to the n at below tree level, because i could see the trees/branches in front of the light.  the size is difficult to explain, but it seemed that from where i was lying, my view was like the size of a lightbult, (a star would be a small spot in comparison ?).  it passed by once and that i saw.  incidentally, the bright star-like lights i have been witnessing cirlcing nightly (in the ne sky) were flashing noticably more prominently.
content.summary: While looking out my bedroom window, a bright large light sped across the ne sky below tree level

content.detailedDescription: It happened on july 4 2003, on the roof top of my sister's old building in manhattan. the building is located on the corner of amsterdam & 60th st. i had gone up on the roof to see some fireworks that had been going off in the vicinity of central park. upon looking toward the park area, i took a look over to the right and saw a perfectly round, about 4ft. in diameter ball, sphere, orb, etc. it appeared to be orange (a lite glow), but transparent with a smoke or gas inside. the reason it caught my eye, was because it was slowly floating uptown toward us on amsterdam avenue, at around the same elevation (maybe a floor higher) then we had been on. this means it was under the rooftops of some of the surrounding buildings. so hear it was floating between the buildings and up the avenue in a slow straight line. this is what made me more curious. i tapped my friend who started watching it too. we were making guesses at what it could be. i thought a may be some big round balloon or beach ball with helium in it, but there was no nub or string from it. it had no distinctive colors. just that smokey orange glow. the other thing was it didn't move with the wind as would a balloon. it just slowly floated by in a perfect straight line. then it disappeared behind an adjacent building to the northeast. i was wondering if anybody could see it right outside there windows. i no longer could see it, when just then a firework went off and lit up the sky. i saw the orange orb now floating in a straight line east, and away from us. it was still creeping slow and between the buildings, but now it made a 90' turn and was heading east on 60th st. toward the park and the fireworks. a second after that the hospital building across the street cut off my view. after that experiance, i just kept thinking of what it could be. i wasn't scared when it happened, i was just observing. i sometimes think that this thing was doing the same. in all my life i've never seen anything like that. it made a believer out of me. my friend was laughing (as in disbelief) about it, as if we had made a new discorvery of some sort. it was like seeing bigfoot. it was something said to not exist. something many people claim they've seen, but still a piece of you is a sceptic. now i feel like i'm the crazy one, because i still don't know what i saw that night. it's taken me a long time to come forward, but i still feel as though i need an answer. now i have a greater interest in the ufo world. upon browsing for answers, i came across this web sight that i never knew of. now i'm sending you in hopes that i may get some sort of answer to what this might have been. does the government really know of these things, or even care? is it taken seriously? will i be looked at as crazy? will anyone even read this? are there others who have reported this, or something like this? will i ever get an answer to these questions? please help to enlighten me on this subject.
content.summary: Me and my friend both saw a floating orange orb

content.detailedDescription: I observed four star like objects moving in the southeastern sky last night at 10:15pm.  the met and formed a boomerang, like shape, which brightened and flashed a few times before dimming, then resumed the light intensity of a star.  it continued moving about the southeastern sky.  approx: fifteen minutes later the four objects reformed into a boomerang shap, rebrightened and resumed a bright oragne intense light which flashed.  it was followed by a thunder like sound this time, the lights then quickly dimmed and the four star like objects dispursed in a northsouth direction.
content.summary: I observed four star like objects moving in the sky which met and brightened
